title: Team recruitment
body:
Abyss Fox e-Sports is currently looking for a  player to enlarging our roster, currently looking for a support player at a rank of gold 4+ max being gold 1 with a decent champion pool

If you fell like you would like more info about the team or want to inquire a spot on the team, feel free to add me in game

replies.body: I'll play. I'm silver 3 on my main. But I've been involved with teams before, and done work for challenger teams.
